text.一部のキャラが複数のトレーニングに現れた: A character has appeared in multiple facilities.
text.料理が大成功するとスキルのヒントを獲得できます！\\nさらに、料理に1つ以上の効: Get a dish perfect to receive a skill hint! \nA new effect will be added as well!
text.大成功した時の追加効果は料理によって異なります！\\n何が追加されるかは作ってみ: The added effect from a perfect dish varies per dish! \nYou'll find out what it is when making it♪
text.料理へのモチベーションが高まっています！\\n大成功間違いなしですね！: Her motivation to cook has increased! \nResults are bound to end up perfect!
text.・料理が大成功するとスキルのヒントを獲得できます。\\n・大成功した料理には1つ:
・Perfectly preparing a dish grants a skill hint. 
・Perfect dishes gain an additional effect. 
・The added effect varies per dish. 
・The Cooking Gauge fills by the received Cooking Pt. 
・A full gauge guarantees a perfect dish. 
・The gauge resets afterwards and can be filled again. 
・The Cooking Pt gained from this perfect 
dish carries over after the reset.
